trackyourorder.title.title: Track Your Order Title
trackyourorder.title.description: Input the title to display on the track your order page.

trackyourorder.subtitle.title: Track Your Order Description
trackyourorder.subtitle.description: Input the description to display on the track your order page.
trackyourorder.subtitle.default: To check the shipping status and details of an order, please enter your TCI Order Number and Billing ZIP Code, then click Continue.

trackyourorder.orderNumberLabel.title: Track Your Order Order Number Label
trackyourorder.orderNumberLabel.description: Input the label to display on the track your order page for the Order Number/PO Number
trackyourorder.orderNumberLabel.default: PO Number (or TCI Order Number in case of credit card orders):

trackyourorder.billZipLabel.title: Track Your Order Bill Zip Label
trackyourorder.billZipLabel.description: Input the label to display on the track your order page for the Billing Zip.

trackyourorder.notrackinfo.title: Tracking Information Not Available
trackyourorder.notrackinfo.description: Enter the description of not Available tracking information.

trackyourorder.noTrackingMessage.title: Message For Items With No Tracking Info
trackyourorder.noTrackingMessage.description: Input message to display for subscription items.
trackyourorder.noTrackingMessage.default: Please note that license-only items will not have tracking info. Instructions on how to get started with online access were sent to
